mapper.update: update task_attachments set company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, task_id = #{taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_name = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_url = #{fileUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_type = #{fileType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_size_bytes = #{fileSizeBytes,jdbcType=BIGINT}, uploaded_by = #{uploadedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, uploaded_at = #{uploadedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where task_attachment_id = #{taskAttachmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select task_attachment_id, company_id, task_id, file_name, file_url, file_type, file_size_bytes, uploaded_by, uploaded_at from task_attachments where task_attachment_id = #{taskAttachmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select task_attachment_id, company_id, task_id, file_name, file_url, file_type, file_size_bytes, uploaded_by, uploaded_at from task_attachments
